Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: However , the maximal reduction in body weight seen in animals that received polymer - bound DOX ( 4 mg / kg ) was significantly lower than that observed in those that received free DOX ( 4 mg / kg ) or a mixture of the unmodified parent HPMA copolymer and free DOX ( 4 mg / kg ; P less than 0 . 01 ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| polymer-bound DOX |
| free DOX |
| unmodified parent HPMA copolymer |
| free DOX |

Note: The entities in the paragraph are not actually diseases, but rather drug formulations and components. The "disease" entities in this paragraph would be the conditions being treated or managed by the drugs, which are not explicitly mentioned.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| none |

The paragraph does not mention any specific diseases. The entities mentioned are drug formulations and components, and do not clearly refer to diseases. Therefore, the table above contains no entries.
